sourceMeaningMnemonic: A <radical>canopy</radical> and a <radical>helicopter</radical> are being <radical>compare</radical>d by a <kanji>deer</kanji>. The deer is standing very still (as deer do) and looking very slowly between the empty canopy and the helicopter sitting next to it.
meaningInfo: Picture the deer comparing the two structures. It probably has no idea what they are, but it's trying very hard to understand what it's seeing anyway.
readingMnemonic: Picture the deer comparing the two structures. It probably has no idea what they are, but it's trying very hard to understand what it's seeing anyway.
readingInfo: Deer get hit by cars all the time, but it was still really shocking . I mean it was right in front of you. The car could have hit you too!
